name: The Battle Cats POP!
overview: The tower-defense hit Battle Cats has achieved over 23,000,000 downloads worldwide for smartphones and tablets, and is now bursting onto a new handheld scene with a Nintendo 3DS release! Why be content with conquering the planet when the galaxy is yours to dominate?! Plus, The Battle Cats POP! introduces the hotly anticipated VS Mode feature. Battle your friends and family for cool rewards! ☆Special Features for the 3DS☆ ・3D Battle Sequences ・No additional in-app purchases ・Pick up Uber Rare units from Capsules
